text: Jihara bada apane raba valom ika dalila te hai, usa tom ba'ada alaha valom usa la'i ika gavaha vi a gi'a ate usa tom pahilam musa di kitaba raha daseri ate kirapa de rupa vica maujuda si, ajihe loka hi isa upara imana li'a'unde hana ate vakha vakha samuham vicom je ko'i isa tom inakara kare tam usa de va'ade di tham aga hai. Tusim isa sabadha vica kise saka vica na pavom. Iha saca hai tuhade raba valom paratu zi'adatara loka isa nu nahim samajhade
